name: Avoid Main Procedures having the FETCH statement not followed by the word "TITLE" (PL1)
description: This rule searches all PL1 Main Procedures  having FETCH without the TITLE option.
output:
The report lists all the PL1 Main Procedures  having FETCH without the TITLE option. 

It provides following information: 
-  PL1 Main Procedure full name
rationale: For better performance, It is recommended to declare a component as fetchable in the fetchable component itself rather then issuing a fetch.
remediation: Limit the usage of FETCH and add "OPTIONS(FETCHABLE)" to the ENTRY declaration.
alternativeName: Avoid Main Procedures having the FETCH statement not followed by the word "TITLE" (PL1)
